afaaz.description: I am on a mission to help talented people in the IT and Medical sectors give great presentations. I know what it is like to struggle to get your point across. Especially in a foreign language.
afaaz.name: Tony Brown

index.ooupd:
Who am I and why do I do this?

Good question. I am glad you asked. I am a person who has struggled to give presentations in a foreign language. I have panicked and forgotten what I wanted to say. Missed opportunities because i cold not get my point across. I have also watched many very smart and talented people try to give presentations that they were just not ready to give. Their knowledge and expertise lost on the audience because they did not have the presentation skills to make their information easy to understand and have the impact it should.

wcijq.heading: Get my basic framework for your next presentation
wcijq.body: This framework will help you develop and present that next presentation you need to give. Download it and give it a try.
